org.agreement_technologies.service.map_dtg

Class DTGImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agreement_technologies.service.map_dtg.DTGImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DTG

    public class DTGImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements DTG
    DTGImp class represents a Domain Transition Graph of a variable.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DTGImp.Path
      Path class represents a path (set of value transitions) in the DTG.
      class  DTGImp.Transition
      Transition class represents a transition between values of a variable.

        public int pathCostMulti(java.lang.String initValue,
                java.lang.String endValue)
        Returns the path cost (in number of actions) for the currect variable to change from a given initial value to the given end value. Unlike the pathCost method, this one is designed for multi-agent evaluation.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        initValue - Initial value
        endValue - End value

      • addTransition

        public void addTransition(java.lang.String startValue,
                 java.lang.String finalValue,
                 GroundedCond[] commonPrecs,
                 GroundedEff[] commonEffs,
                 java.lang.String fromAgent)
        Adds a new transition to this DTG.
        Parameters:
        startValue - Initial value
        finalValue - End value
        commonPrecs - Common preconditions to all the actions that produce this transition
        commonEffs - Common effects to all the actions that produce this transition
        fromAgent - Agent that produces this transition

      • getPath

        public java.lang.String[] getPath(java.lang.String initValue,
                         java.lang.String endValue,

                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> newValues,
                         int threadIndex)
        Returns the path (list of values) for the currect variable to change from a given initial value to the given end value. This method is not designed for multi-agent evaluation.
        Specified by:
        getPath in interface DTG
        Parameters:
        initValue - Initial value
        endValue - End value
        state - Current state
        newValues - Already achieved values for all the variables
        threadIndex - Thread index (for multi-thread purposes)
        Returns:
        Array of values
        Since:
        1.0
